title: Word Connections
description: Find the word that connects all the others in each group!

questions.question: What word connects: Cake, Cream, Cube, Age?
questions.explanation: ICE connects them all: Ice cake, ice cream, ice cube, ice age.

questions.question: What word connects: Light, Beam, Rise, Flower?
questions.explanation: SUN connects them all: Sunlight, sunbeam, sunrise, sunflower.

questions.question: What word connects: Storm, Flake, Ball, Man?
questions.explanation: SNOW connects them all: Snowstorm, snowflake, snowball, snowman.

questions.question: What word connects: Boat, Guard, Long, Style?
questions.explanation: LIFE connects them all: Lifeboat, lifeguard, lifelong, lifestyle.

questions.question: What word connects: Fall, Proof, Melon, Works?
questions.explanation: WATER connects them all: Waterfall, waterproof, watermelon, waterworks.

questions.question: What word connects: Fly, Cup, Milk, Fingers?
questions.explanation: BUTTER connects them all: Butterfly, buttercup, buttermilk, butterfingers.

questions.question: What word connects: Berry, Bird, Jack, Out?
questions.explanation: BLACK connects them all: Blackberry, blackbird, blackjack, blackout.

questions.question: What word connects: Ache, Band, Line, Quarters?
questions.explanation: HEAD connects them all: Headache, headband, headline, headquarters.

questions.question: What word connects: Bell, Knob, Step, Way?
questions.explanation: DOOR connects them all: Doorbell, doorknob, doorstep, doorway.

questions.question: What word connects: Bow, Coat, Drop, Storm?
questions.explanation: RAIN connects them all: Rainbow, raincoat, raindrop, rainstorm.

questions.question: What word connects: Light, House, Place, Side?
questions.explanation: FIRE connects them all: Firelight, firehouse, fireplace, fireside.

questions.question: What word connects: Shine, Light, Stone, Beam?
questions.explanation: MOON connects them all: Moonshine, moonlight, moonstone, moonbeam.

questions.question: What word connects: Guard, Saving, Span, Expectancy?
questions.explanation: LIFE connects them all: Lifeguard, lifesaving, lifespan, life expectancy.

questions.question: What word connects: Mark, Worm, Shelf, Store?
questions.explanation: BOOK connects them all: Bookmark, bookworm, bookshelf, bookstore.

questions.question: What word connects: Print, Nail, Tip, Point?
questions.explanation: FINGER connects them all: Fingerprint, fingernail, fingertip, fingerpoint (to finger-point).

questions.question: What word connects: Shine, Burn, Set, Screen?
questions.explanation: SUN connects them all: Sunshine, sunburn, sunset, sunscreen.

questions.question: What word connects: Chair, Pit, Rest, Band?
questions.explanation: ARM connects them all: Armchair, armpit, armrest, armband.

questions.question: What word connects: Lash, Brow, Lid, Shadow?
questions.explanation: EYE connects them all: Eyelash, eyebrow, eyelid, eye shadow.

questions.question: What word connects: Work, Sick, Ward, Coming?
questions.explanation: HOME connects them all: Homework, homesick, homeward, homecoming.

questions.question: What word connects: Yard, Bone, Pack, Lash?
questions.explanation: BACK connects them all: Backyard, backbone, backpack, backlash.
